item1.note: Optimize the apical 4-ch to include LV, RV, LA and RA. Narrow the b-mode sector to increase frame rates. Do not forshorten. Acquire 3 beat acquistions.

item2.note: Optimize the apical 2-ch to include LV and LA.Do not forshorten. Acquire 3 beat acquistions.
